about_the_game:
This 113 track soundtrack covers every single track that was in "Women of Xal". Yes, even the cutscene version of tracks that were obviously edited from the original one to fit the scene better.

If you liked the Jazz, the eerie vocals, the genre splicing -- the whole "we just made up genres here", and also want to be sad that some of the tunes in this soundtrack are not in the official release of the game, then come on in! You're reading the right place... and all that.

Composed by Johnathan Johnson, founder of PlotTwist Studios LLC
detailed_description:
This 113 track soundtrack covers every single track that was in "Women of Xal". Yes, even the cutscene version of tracks that were obviously edited from the original one to fit the scene better.

If you liked the Jazz, the eerie vocals, the genre splicing -- the whole "we just made up genres here", and also want to be sad that some of the tunes in this soundtrack are not in the official release of the game, then come on in! You're reading the right place... and all that.

name: Women of Xal: The Official Soundtrack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Women of Xal: The Official Soundtrack

short_description: When you create 100 tracks for a game you also spent a decade writing for, you get a little tired. A little loopy. And somewhere in the middle, comes this rainbow of a genre-splicing soundtrack for visual novel "Women of Xal".
